message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a decent amount, but I want more for myself
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but I'm still being generous!
I'm being very generous, take it or leave it!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving away the farm!
